metadata.synopsis: Wyll reacts to Ravengard dying while they are escaping.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Wyll Reacts to Ravengard dying while they are in the Iron Throne. This happens only if Ravengard was alive initially and then dies (only if Mizora's pact is broken, if it's kept, Mizora will prevent Ravengard's death).Can happen after the moment of death if Wyll is far away and then comes close to see his dead body.

0.speaker: Wyll
0.context: NodeContext: Wyll reacts in the moment to his father's death at the player's hands.
